en-US.2liEAh: You've just created a new client. Here is an email that will describe how Inyo works for both of you.
en-US.3yX04R: I am using Inyo for your project {=[nom du projet]} status reporting
en-US.A0ta1: I am going to use Inyo, a comprehensive project management tool, to communicate with you during our collaboration on {=[nom du projet]}.
en-US.1M1ck5: You're soon going to receive some email from {assistantName} from Inyo. Don't throw them in spam. They will keep you up to date on the progress of the project.
en-US.3TOfo0: In order to keep you aware of the progress, you will regularly receive summary of the finished tasks or notifications if your input is needed on some section of the project.
en-US.uiH15: These emails will contain a personalized link that will allow you to access the project's page. You will be able to comment, mark tasks as done and attach or retrieve documents.
en-US.tYdWe: Thank you for using this platform for our communications. This will makes our collaboration easier by centralizing all our exchanges and documents.
en-US.1nFKKG: If you have any questions please send them to me.
en-US.4bagxL:
Hello {customerName},

I am going to use Inyo, a comprehensive project management tool, to communicate with you during our collaboration on **[Name of the project]**.
You're soon going to receive some email from {assistantName} from Inyo. Don't throw them in spam. They will keep you up to date on the progress of the project.
In order to keep you aware of the progress, you will regularly receive summary of the finished tasks or notifications if your input is needed on some section of the project.

These emails will contain a personalized link that will allow you to access the project's page. You will be able to comment, mark tasks as done and attach or retrieve documents.

Thank you for using this platform for our communications. This will makes our collaboration easier by centralizing all our exchanges and documents.

If you have any questions please send them to me.

en-US.4x6hMz: This is the amount you will invoice your client.
en-US.1ldMXj: {=La rentabilité est le ratio entre le budget vendu et la somme des budgets travaillés et budget encore prévu.}{=Une rentabilité supérieure à 1 indique vous avez travaillé moins que ce que vous avez vendu.}{=Une rentabilité entre 0 et 1 indique que vous avez travaillé plus que ce que vous aviez prévu.}
en-US.4guTYD: Rentability is the ratio between the budget sold and what you already worked plus what's still planned.
en-US.2Ilpu3: A rentability above 1 shows you worked less than planned.
en-US.3acQGB: A rentability between 0 and 1 shows you worked more than planned.
en-US.45qjII: {=Le budget réel est la somme des jours de travail dans votre projet multipliée par votre taux journalier moyen.}
en-US.2M7XnL: The real budget is the number of days of work in your project times your daily rate.
en-US.129uWa: {=Le budget restant correspond à la différence du montant du travail déjà effectué et le budget que vous avez vendu à votre client.}
en-US.46gWDm: The remaining budget is your budget sold minus the amount of work you've already done.
en-US.50tx4: {=L'avenant à facturer est la différence entre le budget vendu et le budget réel. Il correspond à l'excédent de travail que vous allez fournir.}
